page.title: 04TRADE IN HARLOW
page.content: In our twelve squares there are three main shopping areas,apart from the Town Centre,Bush Fair,Staple Tye and Potter Street.There are also 10 hatches which are smaller areas consisting of 3 or 4 shops.Most of the people seem to visit the town centre once a week for their main shop but found their local shopping areas very convenient and probably visit these about three times a week.In general we found the local areas were slightly more expensive than the town centre. Our favourite shop was the joke and hire-a-costume shop.The owner said that she started off by selling jokes and then introduced costumes.She now has over 100,the most popular being the French maid and the gorilla.Her busiest times of the year are Christmas and halloween.
